channel.title: Screen resize resolution bug
channel.description: I know that it's a very known bug but I cannot resize VirtualBox machine window, the resolution of Whonix Gateway and Workstation remain the same. The only working solution for me is to force resolution through "Virtual screen 1", but real-time changing resolution is not working. And even when i manually set Whonix resolution through "Virtual screen 1", from time to time screen size not changing at all, so I often need to restart Whonix instances in order to change resolution to manually set.
